description: Annotate datapoints over time for a specific data quality statistic.

parameters.name: InclusionAnnotations
parameters.description: A list of DatapointInclusionAnnotation's. (dict) --- An Inclusion Annotation. ProfileId (string) --- The ID of the data quality profile the statistic belongs to. StatisticId (string) --- The Statistic ID. InclusionAnnotation (string) --- The inclusion annotation value to apply to the statistic.

nested_params.name: ProfileId
nested_params.description: The ID of the data quality profile the statistic belongs to.

nested_params.name: InclusionAnnotation
nested_params.description: The inclusion annotation value to apply to the statistic.

nested_items.name: ProfileId
nested_items.description: The Profile ID for the failed annotation.

nested_items.name: StatisticId
nested_items.description: The Statistic ID for the failed annotation.

nested_items.name: FailureReason
nested_items.description: The reason why the annotation failed.
